data.actual_result: Scrollbar is entirely unresponsive for roughly 10 seconds, then resizes and goes back to normal. System settings: Windows 10 Professional, Canary Build
data.expected_result: Scrollbar will automatically resize and become responsive/usable if needed
data.short_description: Scrolling down then Search in the Members list causes the scrollbar to become unresponsive for a short amount of time
data.steps_to_repro: - Server Settings > Members - Scroll down the list a bit - Search an uncommon name that won't return many results - Attempt to use the scrollbar
